articles.title: Talks Held between DPRK Minister of People's Security, Mongolian Minister of Justice
articles.content:
Talks Held between DPRK Minister of People's Security, Mongolian Minister of Justice
						
Pyongyang, November 27 (KCNA) -- Talks between Ri Myong Su, minister of People's Security of the DPRK, and Temuujin Khishigdemberel, minister of Justice of Mongolia, took place at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Tuesday.
					Present there from the DPRK side were officials of the Ministry of People's Security including Councilor and Department Director Ri Song Chol and from the Mongolian side the delegation of the Ministry of Justice of Mongolia and Ambassador Manibadrakh Ganbold and staff members of the Mongolian embassy here.
					
					At the talks the two sides exchanged views on the issue of further developing the exchange and cooperation between security organs of the two countries and matters of mutual concern.
